content:
The first Google-certified dongle for bringing wireless Android Auto to cars is launching today, but launch inventory sold out instantly. Luckily, a restock of the Motorola MA1 is in the works.

The post Motorola’s wireless Android Auto dongle sells out instantly on Amazon, now available at Target [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The smash hit Motorola MA1 dongle brings wireless Android Auto to more cars, and luckily it's going to be restocked on Amazon soon.
